ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
For now, this computes the planar cross-section of a 3D mesh. Given a
3D mesh and a cut plane, this computes a (set of) polyline(s) that
results from cutting the mesh with the plane. Requires python and
numpy. Mayavi is used for visualisation in the examples.
about.summary: meshcut - Python utilities to slice 3D triangular meshes

about.description:
For now, this computes the planar cross-section of a 3D mesh. Given a
3D mesh and a cut plane, this computes a (set of) polyline(s) that
results from cutting the mesh with the plane. Requires python and
numpy. Mayavi is used for visualisation in the examples.
about.summary: meshcut - Python utilities to slice 3D triangular meshes

name: meshcut
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "meshcut" %}
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/meshcut-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c07b5ceac38ecd13987cf20aadc099dcfcf7103856ddff7cfd87fa9f05057f21

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - numpy
    - numpy-stl
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - scipy

test:
  imports:
    - meshcut
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/julienr/meshcut
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: meshcut - Python utilities to slice 3D triangular meshes
  description: |
    For now, this computes the planar cross-section of a 3D mesh. Given a
    3D mesh and a cut plane, this computes a (set of) polyline(s) that
    results from cutting the mesh with the plane. Requires python and 
    numpy. Mayavi is used for visualisation in the examples.
  doc_url: https://github.com/julienr/meshcut
  dev_url: https://github.com/julienr/meshcut

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
